mod.name: Stick War 2: Empires
mod.description: Experience the original Stick War 2 campaign with all 3 empires! All upgrades are unlocked, and there are no changes in gameplay (except in one place :D).
mod.developers:
RinasSam: Concept and most of the programming.
Dyzqy: Concept, programming, and finishing touches.
s07: Programming help and bug fixes.
Black, Clementchuah, Cosmic Chad, Elijah, GreyScale, Peece, Percival, RandomShiet, RedCoolsteve, Waterbug, and William1: General Playtesting.
75g: Extensive Chaos playtestng at 4am.
Lttsumm1743: Extensive playtesting and suggestions.
ShadowEmpire: Extensive Chaos playtesting on Insane mode.
Zortcele: Extensive Elemental playtesting on Insane mode.
SnowStrider: New campaign map (remade).
Pyro: Title screen art.
Chicago Symphony Orchestra and Ashkenazy: Credits music.
RinasSam's Father: Title screen positioning help.
AsePlayer: Bug fixes and final pass.
mod.additional_credits: StickPage Studios for the Rebels map background.
